changeSet.author: mdaly
changeSet.comment: Set the associatedCall for the "X Chromosome deletion or duplication inconclusive..." HorizonDiseaseResultTemplate (id 52) to a ResultCall that has a POSITIVE resultType. It originally was set to "Other" (id 3), which has an OTHER resultType). Use the "Pathogenic variant" ResultCall (id 6) as a generic positive. (Refer to ENG-6333.xml to confirm ids.)
